dialogueText: At last, you reach the ground floor.
As you descend the last of the steps, you find Aurora waiting for you.
For a moment, you're worried it might be another tower guardian.
Don't worry, Dreamer! It's me, I promise.
Has her strength recovered?
No, I'm afraid I'm still very weak.
I still can't touch anything... but this should mean the tower stops trying to attack us, at least.
You really hope so. You don't want to face any more of your friends in battle, even if they're only copies that look like them!
Can she teleport again?
I'm afraid it may still be days before I can do that.
Days?!
What about her sisters? How are you supposed to get back to rescue them? You can't leave them at Dracula's mercy for days, who knows what he might do to them?
I'm hoping that when we reach–
You are interrupted by a loud banging sound.
What is it? More tower defenses?
But no – there is a doorway nearby, a large one in the outer wall of the tower.
It must lead out into the forest of Haven...
As you look at it, the banging starts up again.
Someone is out there, banging on the door!
You cross to it and place your hand on the door handle.
Don't open it, Dreamer!
What? Why not?
We don't know who it could be!
But...
What if it's someone in need of help?
It could be Kyo!
Or one of Dracula's minions!
The banging on the door is more insistent... and then you hear the muffled sound of a female voice, shouting.
You know that voice!
As you swing the door open, a familiar figure almost tumbles through.
Dreamer! Aurora!
What are you doing here?
What are you doing here? What is she doing here?
Scouting, of course!
I was out in the forests, scouting the base of this tower when it started... glowing and making noises.
I rushed here to find out what was going on and I heard what I thought were the sounds of fighting inside.
What's going on? Are you in a battle? I thought you were in the Haunted Realm rescuing the Night Stone!
No, no battle... well, yes, you were fighting against the tower... well, the tower was creating monsters to fight you... it's complicated.
Sounds it...
Robin, we have something we need to do and we have little time, so...
Maybe I can accompany you? I've always wondered what the inside of this tower looks like!
Ah, no, that's not what...
Come on, Aurora, having Robin along could be helpful. Especially if something decides to attack you again.
You have my bow, Dreamer!
Ah... y-yes...
So, with Robin joining you, you head back into the tower.
Aurora takes the lead, leading you down into lower ground levels.
It doesn't take long before more tower guardians appear, however.
What were you saying about things deciding to attack us, Dreamer?
Run!
But no matter where you go, more tower guardians appear. There seem to be even more than before!
You thought Aurora said they wouldn't attack you any more now she was able to manifest.
That's what I thought!
Well, they're clearly attacking us!
I don't understand... they shouldn't be doing this!
It must be him! The Nightmare Child!
He must have done something when he was here, changed something!
How?
I... I don't know...
Well, talking about it won't help now...
Robin unslings her bow and nocks an arrow to the string.
Right, let's discourage these things from following us any further, shall we!
이미 알고 있는 얼굴들을 상대하는 일이라 조금 버거웠다.
미소 짓는 얼굴로 공격하는 사람들...
그들을 피해 계단 아래로 뛰어 내려가자 멍한 표정의 오로라가 서있었다.
오로라?
방금, 무슨 일이...
죄송해요, 제가 뭔가 실수하진 않았나요? 기억이 애매해서...
아마 탑의 방비 기능 때문인 것 같다고 오로라에게 설명했다.
드림 스톤까지 마음대로 조종할 수 있다니, 탑에 꼭 자아가 있는 것 같았다.
탑 자체에도 약간이지만 그런 힘이 깃들어 있을 거예요.
시스템이 아니라 실제로 자아가 있다고?
오로라가 몸을 돌려 굳게 닫혀 있던 문을 밀어 열었다.
말씀드렸던 것처럼, 이 탑에는 판타지아의 시작이라고 할 수 있는 것이 있으니까요. 그 영향일 거예요.
아래로 이어지는 새로운 계단이 나타났다.
그러나 그 앞에는 탑 안으로 통하는 거대한 문이 앞을 막고 있었다.
슬슬...
오로라와 단둘이서 탑을 내려가는 건 조금 어려운 일일지도 모른다는 생각이 들었다.
메르헨을 소환해서 싸울 수 있는 건 다행이지만, 지금처럼 이상한 상황이 벌어지면...
누구 한 사람 정도는 도와줄 사람이 있었으면 좋겠다고 생각하지 않을 수 없었다.
그러자 문 너머에서 작은 노크 소리가 들렸다.
방금, 당신도 들으셨나요?
응, 노크 소리가 들렸어.
탑에 이런 문이 생긴 건 처음 있는 일이에요. 어딘가로 연결된 걸까요?
오로라의 목소리에 대답하듯 노크 소리가 조금 더 커졌다.
문이 부서질 것 같은데...
혹시 무슨 생각을 하고 계셨는지 여쭈어도 될까요?
당신의 생각이 이 탑에 반영된 건지도 몰라요.
아, 그건...
한명 정도는 조력자가 있으면 좋겠다는 생각을 하긴 했는데...
그 순간 굉음과 함께 문이 부서지고 누군가 모습을 드러냈다.
휴, 깜짝이야. 놀라진 않으셨나요? 그래도 어쩔 수 없지만요.
나뭇잎들이 속삭이는 소리 때문에 오지 않을 수 없었거든요.
로빈 후드!
그렇게 반가워해 주니 고맙네요.
자꾸 숲으로 부르는 소리가 들리길래, 탑에 무슨 일이 생겼을 거라는 건 예상했지만...
갑자기 이상한 게이트가 나타나서 좀 당황스러웠거든요.
뭐, 안에 뭐가 있든 쳐부수면 그만이라는 생각으로 들어온 거긴 하지만.
... 정체도 알 수 없는 게이트에 일단 뛰어들고 봤다는 소리야?
네, 정답이네요.
정답이라기에는, 좀... 무모하지 않았나요?
어쨌든 잘 됐잖아요? 오로라 씨와 꿈꾸는 자도 마침 동행인이 필요한 것 아니었어요?
아, 아니. 제 말은 그런 뜻이 아니라... 꿈꾸는 자, 그런 생각을 하고 계셨나요?
확실히, 누구 한 명 정도는 거들어 줄 사람이 있으면 좋겠다고 생각한 건 사실이다. 특히 길 찾기에 좀 능숙한 사람으로...
당신이 생각할 수 있는 가장 유능한 사람이 나였다는 뜻이죠?
뭐랄까, 어떻게 된 건지는 잘 모르겠지만...
... 정말 이 탑이 내 생각을 듣고 로빈을 데리고 와 준 건가?
수호자들이 끝없이 공격하기에 내쫓고 싶어 하는 줄 알았는데.
오로라의 말대로 정말 탑이 나에게 무언가를 보여주고 싶어 하는 걸까?
이야기 중에 미안하지만, 잠깐만요. 저게 대체 뭐에요?
탑 아래에서 무언가 기어 올라오는 소리가 들렸다.
불길한 예감은 틀리지 않는다더니...
드림리스를 닮은 수호자들이 난간을 타고 기어 올라온다.
이 탑의 수호자들이에요, 로빈!
수호자요? 생김새만 보면 저주받은 것처럼 생겼는데?
수호자의 탑은 상대방의 기억을 읽고 그걸 형상화 하는 힘이 있어요.
아니, 어쩌면...
심연의 종에게 어떤 영향을 받은 건지도...
우선 아래층으로 내려가 봐야 알 수 있는 거지?
네, 꿈꾸는 자. ... ...가 당신을 기다리고 있을 거예요.
오로라가 작은 목소리로 속삭였다.
그녀의 우울한 목소리를 끊고 로빈이 행복한 목소리로 외쳤다.
자, 그럼 속전속결! 신속 정확하게! 다 쳐부수면 그만이라는 거죠?
At last, you reach the ground floor.
As you descend the last of the steps, you find Aurora waiting for you.
For a moment, you're worried it might be another tower guardian.
Don't worry, Dreamer! It's me, I promise.
Has her strength recovered?
No, I'm afraid I'm still very weak.
I still can't touch anything... but this should mean the tower stops trying to attack us, at least.
You really hope so. You don't want to face any more of your friends in battle, even if they're only copies that look like them!
Can she teleport again?
I'm afraid it may still be days before I can do that.
Days?!
What about her sisters? How are you supposed to get back to rescue them? You can't leave them at Dracula's mercy for days, who knows what he might do to them?
I'm hoping that when we reach–
You are interrupted by a loud banging sound.
What is it? More tower defences?
But no – there is a doorway nearby, a large one in the outer wall of the tower.
It must lead out into the forest of Haven...
As you look at it, the banging starts up again.
Someone is out there, banging on the door!
You cross to it and place your hand on the door handle.
Don't open it, Dreamer!

We don't know who it could be!
But...
What if it's someone in need of help?
It could be Kyo!
Or one of Dracula's minions!

You know that voice!

What are you doing here? What is she doing here?
Scouting, of course!
I was out in the forests, scouting the base of this tower when it started... glowing and making noises.
I rushed here to find out what was going on and I heard what I thought were the sounds of fighting inside.

No, no battle... well, yes, you were fighting against the tower... well, the tower was creating monsters to fight you... it's complicated.
Sounds it...
Robin, we have something we need to do and we have little time, so...
Maybe I can accompany you? I've always wondered what the inside of this tower looks like!
Ah, no, that's not what...
Come on, Aurora, having Robin along could be helpful. Especially if something decides to attack you again.
You have my bow, Dreamer!
Ah... y-yes...
So, with Robin joining you, you head back into the tower.
Aurora takes the lead, leading you down into lower ground levels.
It doesn't take long before more tower guardians appear, however.
What were you saying about things deciding to attack us, Dreamer?
Run!
But no matter where you go, more tower guardians appear. There seem to be even more than before!
You thought Aurora said they wouldn't attack you any more now she was able to manifest.
That's what I thought!
Well, they're clearly attacking us!
I don't understand... they shouldn't be doing this!
It must be him! The Nightmare Child!
He must have done something when he was here, changed something!
How?
I... I don't know...
Well, talking about it won't help now...
Robin unslings her bow and nocks an arrow to the string.
Right, let's discourage these things from following us any further, shall we!
